kb3.name: kb3_navigation
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_navigation` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `nav_type` tinytext NOT NULL, `intern` int(1) NOT NULL, `descr` tinytext NOT NULL, `url` tinytext NOT NULL, `target` char(10) NOT NULL, `posnr` int(11) NOT NULL, `page` tinytext NOT NULL, `hidden` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `KBSITE` char(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
